hero.title:
Rumi:
Experience Flavor, Uninterrupted
hero.subtitle: Explore our diverse menu and order delicious food online – anytime, anywhere.

about.title: About Rumi
about.paragraph1: At Rumi, we believe that great food should be accessible to everyone. That's why we've redesigned our online ordering experience to be seamless, intuitive, and user-friendly. Whether you're browsing from your desktop or on the go, our new website makes it easy to discover our menu, customize your order, and enjoy a hassle-free online ordering process.
about.paragraph2: We're committed to providing a delightful dining experience, from the first click to the last bite.  Connect with us on social media or give us a call – we’d love to hear from you!
